products.name: Anki Cozmo Robot
products.description: This interactive robot is a great gift for kids of all ages. It can be programmed to do tricks, play games, and even learn new things.

products.name: LEGO Creator Mighty Dinosaurs Triceratops
products.description: This 3-in-1 LEGO set lets kids build a Triceratops, a Triceratops with a baby, or a Triceratops skeleton. It's a great way for kids to learn about dinosaurs and have fun at the same time.

products.name: Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends Batcave
products.description: This action-packed Batcave set comes with Batman, Robin, and a host of other DC Super Friends characters. Kids can use the set to recreate their favorite Batman stories or create their own adventures.

products.name: SKLZ Quickster Portable Basketball Hoop
products.description: This portable basketball hoop is a great way for kids to practice their hoops skills at home. It's easy to set up and take down, and it folds up for compact storage.

products.description: This interactive learning system helps kids learn their ABCs, numbers, and more. It comes with a variety of games and activities that are sure to keep kids entertained.

products.name: VTech InnoTab Max 3 Learning Tablet
products.description: This learning tablet is packed with educational games and apps that will keep kids entertained for hours on end. It also comes with a one-year subscription to VTech's Learning Lodge.
